question: Which of the following is NOT a hyperparameter in K-NN algorithm?
K-NN is an example of which type of learning?
Which distance metric is commonly used in the K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) algorithm for continuous data?
Which of the following option is true about k-NN algorithm?

answers.a: It can be used for classification
answers.b: It can be used for regression
answers.c: It can be used for classification and regression
